summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent in the early hours of June 20, 2009. The email contains a link to a website and a brief congratulatory message, indicating a personal or professional relationship between the two individuals.

keyFacts: The email was sent on June 20, 2009, at 1:34 AM.
The subject of the email is 'good going', indicating a positive sentiment.
The email contains a link to a website related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The email is marked as confidential treatment requested by JPMorgan Chase.
